title: A Star So Bright: A Christmas Tale
description: The bear cubs awake from their deep winter slumber. What can it be? they cry, breathless with wonder. Where has the mysterious start come from? What can it be? The animals follow the star through the pages of this magical story to find a very special surprise at the end. This beautifully illustrated picture book has a foiled star die-cut throughout with a blaze of twinkling lights on the last page.
author: M. Christina Butler
